Houston.Health and Physical Education Arena:
Health and Physical Education Arena (H&PE Arena) is an 8,100-seat multi-purpose arena in Houston, Texas.

It was built in 1989 and is home to the Texas Southern University Tigers basketball and volleyball teams. The arena will also play host to most Houston Cougars men's basketball games during the 2017–18 season, as well as all Houston Cougars women's basketball home games in the same season, due to renovations of their arena.
